statements: SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50.00 AND item_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT id, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE item_name = 'Chair';
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 20
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, item_id, quantity, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, address FROM vendors WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, item_id, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered >= 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vendor_name, address FROM vendors WHERE LENGTH(address) > 0 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, item_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003);
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.item_id = orders.item_id WHERE inventory.quantity <= orders.quantity_ordered;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM vendors JOIN orders ON vendors.vendor_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Inventory GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity * unit_price) AS total_price FROM OrderItems GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM Vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT oi.order_id, oi.quantity, i.product_name FROM OrderItems oi JOIN Inventory i ON oi.product_id = i.id WHERE oi.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY oi.quantity DESC, i.product_name;
SELECT co.order_id, co.total_amount, c.order_date FROM CustomerOrders co LEFT JOIN CustomerOrders c ON co.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE co.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT v.vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inventory FROM Vendors v JOIN Inventory i ON v.id = i.vendor_id GROUP BY v.vendor_name HAVING total_inventory > 5 ORDER BY total_inventory DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_number FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-04-01' ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price <= 100.00;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vendor_name, address, contact_number FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, status FROM orders WHERE status='pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT oi.order_item_id, oi.quantity, i.item_name, i.price FROM order_items oi INNER JOIN inventory i ON oi.item_id = i.inventory_id WHERE oi.quantity > 5;
SELECT oh.order_id, oh.status, oh.timestamp, o.customer_name FROM order_history oh INNER JOIN orders o ON oh.order_id = o.order_id WHERE oh.status='cancelled' ORDER BY oh.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
